dependencies: Python/Ansible tooling (requirements.txt): ansible==10.2.0, ansible-core==2.17.2, docker==7.1.0, Jinja2==3.1.4, PyYAML==6.0.1, requests==2.32.3, cryptography==43.0.0, etc. (file: requirements.txt)

Docker images referenced: nestybox/ubuntu-jammy-systemd-docker (Dockerfile.server), redis:7.0.7-alpine (nomad-jobs/pytechco-redis.nomad.hcl), ghcr.io/hashicorp-education/learn-nomad-getting-started/*:1.0 (nomad-jobs/pytechco-web.nomad.hcl, pytechco-employee.nomad.hcl, pytechco-setup.nomad.hcl), tailscale/tailscale (playbooks/servers/setup_apps_and_services.yml)
HashiCorp binaries installed into base image: nomad 1.8.2 and consul 1.19.1 (Dockerfile.server)
deployment_relevant_files: docker-compose.yml (defines 2 sysbox-based Ubuntu system containers on a custom bridge network with static IPs)
Dockerfile.server (builds the system container image; installs python3/pip, git, unzip, wget/curl; downloads nomad+consul; configures SSH authorized_keys)
Vagrantfile (Docker provider; builds Dockerfile.server; creates multiple server containers with static IPs)
inventory.yml (Ansible inventory for localhost + server_1/server_2 over SSH)
Makefile (deploy/destroy/test wrapper around docker network + ansible-playbook)
Taskfile.yml (task runner commands for build/deploy/nomad job run)
architectural_resources: Local infrastructure lab environment (Docker + Sysbox) providing 2 “server” nodes (docker-compose.yml)
Custom Docker bridge network with static addressing (docker-compose.yml, Makefile)
Configuration management/provisioning via Ansible (requirements.txt, playbooks/*, inventory.yml)
Nomad cluster: 1 server (server_1) and 1 client (server_2) configured via Ansible (playbooks/servers/configure_nomad_servers.yml, configure_nomad_clients.yml)
Service discovery integration implied by Nomad service stanzas and template lookups (nomadService "redis-svc") (nomad-jobs/pytechco-*.nomad.hcl)
Web service (Flask-based container image) exposed on port 5000 (nomad-jobs/pytechco-web.nomad.hcl)
Consul binary installed in base image (Dockerfile.server) suggesting optional service discovery/mesh usage
